name: Nox
description: A gaunt figure draped in tattered surgical scrubs and a radiation suit. Nox's skin glows faintly green from constant exposure to radioactive materials, with pulsating veins visible beneath the surface. Tentacles sprout sporadically from their neck and arms, twitching nervously.

personality.voice: Whispered and raspy, with a slight metallic undertone.
personality.agenda: To survive and find a cure for their mutation, even if it means dealing with criminals.
personality.background: Once a promising surgeon in the Zenith-9 medical system, Nox was exposed to radiation during an accident. Shunned by society after developing tentacles, they turned to scavenging and selling illicit goods.

flavor.rationale: Nox ekes out a living selling scavenged medical supplies and black market cybernetics to those who can afford it.
